title.rendered: 5 Habits of High-Velocity Teams Using Kubernetes Webinar

content.rendered:
Did you catch our webinar on the 5 Habits of High-Velocity Teams Using Kubernetes? In case you missed it, we recorded it for you to view on-demand.

Dan Garfield from Codefresh and William Dennis from Google Cloud show you how real teams bring all the components together to make high-velocity deployment to Kubernetes scale. Get a hands-on view of the critical steps that go into making container management a scalable process that not only allows teams to deliver faster but with more confidence in the final result. Check it out:

View FULL WEBINAR HERE

 

You can also view the slide deck on Slideshare :

5 Habits of High-Velocity Teams Using Kubernetes from Codefresh

Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!

Have questions? Schedule a 1:1 with us by clicking here
